pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cloud torrent is a self-hosted remote torrent client, written in Go (golang). You start torrents remotely, which are downloaded as sets of files on the local disk of the server, which are then retrievable or streamable via HTTP.

use.flag: Allow cloud-torrent to run as a system-wide service. Installs an init script and creates a 'torrent' user:group.
